Name: Generate Particle Manifest
Description: Generates a particle manifest based on particles used

Name: Increment Particle Manifest Version
Description: Increments the version of an older particle manifest

Name: Increment Soundscape Version
Description: Increments the version of an older soundscape file

Name: Increment Level Sounds Version
Description: Increments the version of an older level sounds file

Name: Ignore Directory
Description: Does not look in this folder for particle manifest generation and file incrementing
